title: Most menu actions should be disabled for cus from repo
description:
When using the repository view, most of the menu actions should be disabled for cus (customers) from the repo (repository). However, currently, the rest of the menu actions are meaningless and should be removed.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a .java file in the repository view.
OB: Menu actions should be disabled for cus from the repo in the repository view when a .java file is opened.
EB: Menu actions are not disabled for cus from the repo in the repository view when a .java file is opened.
SR: 1. Open a .java file in the repository view and verify that menu actions intended to be disabled for cus from the repo can still be accessed.
